projects.title: UK PACT INTENS - Industrial Energy Efficiency
projects.description: Supporting Indonesia's industrial sector transition to low-carbon operations through capacity building and technical assistance for energy management systems.

projects.title: Medium-Term Strategic Plan Development
projects.description: Formulating strategic plans for government agencies to integrate energy efficiency and low-carbon development into their operational frameworks.

projects.title: National MRV System Development
projects.description: Developing and implementing Monitoring, Reporting, and Verification (MRV) platforms to track energy savings and emission reductions at national level.

projects.title: Energy Auditor Certification Program
projects.description: Training and certifying energy professionals across Indonesia to conduct investment-grade energy audits in buildings and industries.
projects.donor: Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources

projects.title: Natural Resources Baseline Assessment
projects.description: Conducting comprehensive baseline assessments of natural resources to inform sustainable management policies and practices.

projects.title: GEDSI Integration Guidelines Development
projects.description: Developing and disseminating guidelines for integrating Gender Equality, Disability, and Social Inclusion into energy and environment projects.
